title: Add three new songs to the top of the music page

requirements.summary: Add three new songs to the top of the track list on MusicPage.tsx as clickable Suno links in the same style as existing tracks
acceptanceCriteria: The three new songs appear at the very top of the track list on the music page, before any existing songs.
Each new song is rendered as a clickable link using the MusicTrackCard component (or equivalent existing style).
Clicking 'Tasten - din venn eller fiende?' navigates to https://suno.com/s/TiV9L1eSJsCOdCCs.
Clicking 'Caffeine A.I. Code Rush' navigates to https://suno.com/s/BldXyW2xM1nW1C4U.
The new entries visually match the style of the existing song entries on the page.

file_operations.description: Add three new MusicTrackCard components at the top of the track list, before all existing tracks. The new tracks are: 'Unbreakable Signal' linking to https://suno.com/s/owSmEgAmBXYqVuZt, 'Tasten - din venn eller fiende?' linking to https://suno.com/s/TiV9L1eSJsCOdCCs, and 'Caffeine A.I. Code Rush' linking to https://suno.com/s/BldXyW2xM1nW1C4U. Use the MusicTrackCard component with the same structure and styling as the existing track entries on the page. Ensure the new tracks appear above all current tracks in the rendered list.
